(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (DT The) (JJS best))
    (NP (NNP Lo) (NNP Mai) (NNP Kai))))


det(best-2, The-1)
root(ROOT-0, best-2)
nn(Kai-5, Lo-3)
nn(Kai-5, Mai-4)
dep(best-2, Kai-5)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (ADVP (RB ever))
      (VP (VBN eaten)
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP
            (NP (PRP$ my) (NN life))
            (SBAR
              (S
                (VP (VBD was)
                  (PP (IN in)
                    (NP (NNP Petaling) (NNP Jaya))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(eaten-4, I-1)
aux(eaten-4, have-2)
advmod(eaten-4, ever-3)
root(ROOT-0, eaten-4)
prep(eaten-4, in-5)
poss(life-7, my-6)
pobj(in-5, life-7)
rcmod(life-7, was-8)
prep(was-8, in-9)
nn(Jaya-11, Petaling-10)
pobj(in-9, Jaya-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT That))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (ADVP
        (NP (CD 7) (NNS years))
        (RB ago))
      (SBAR
        (WHADVP (WRB when))
        (S
          (NP (PRP I))
          (VP (VBD visited)
            (NP (PRP$ my) (NN cousin))
            (PP (IN in)
              (NP (NNP KL)))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(was-2, That-1)
root(ROOT-0, was-2)
num(years-4, 7-3)
npadvmod(ago-5, years-4)
advmod(was-2, ago-5)
advmod(visited-8, when-6)
nsubj(visited-8, I-7)
advcl(was-2, visited-8)
poss(cousin-10, my-9)
dobj(visited-8, cousin-10)
prep(visited-8, in-11)
pobj(in-11, KL-12)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (NP
        (NP (CD one))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP
            (NP (DT those) (NNS moments))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (NN epiphany)))))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT which))
          (S
            (NP (PRP one))
            (ADVP (RB never))
            (VP (VBZ forgets))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(one-3, It-1)
cop(one-3, was-2)
root(ROOT-0, one-3)
prep(one-3, of-4)
det(moments-6, those-5)
pobj(of-4, moments-6)
prep(moments-6, of-7)
pobj(of-7, epiphany-8)
dobj(forgets-12, which-9)
nsubj(forgets-12, one-10)
neg(forgets-12, never-11)
rcmod(one-3, forgets-12)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADJP (RB too) (JJ bad))
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP I))
          (VP (VBD was) (RB n't)
            (NP (DT a) (NN blogger))
            (ADVP (RB then))
            (, ,)))))))


nsubj(bad-4, It-1)
cop(bad-4, is-2)
advmod(bad-4, too-3)
root(ROOT-0, bad-4)
mark(blogger-10, that-5)
nsubj(blogger-10, I-6)
cop(blogger-10, was-7)
neg(blogger-10, n't-8)
det(blogger-10, a-9)
ccomp(bad-4, blogger-10)
advmod(blogger-10, then-11)


(ROOT
  (S (IN so)
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD did) (RB not)
      (VP (VB take)
        (NP
          (NP (NN note))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (NN address))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (DT the) (NN place))))))))
    (. .)))


dep(take-5, so-1)
nsubj(take-5, I-2)
aux(take-5, did-3)
neg(take-5, not-4)
root(ROOT-0, take-5)
dobj(take-5, note-6)
prep(note-6, of-7)
det(address-9, the-8)
pobj(of-7, address-9)
prep(address-9, of-10)
det(place-12, the-11)
pobj(of-10, place-12)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN Since)
      (NP (RB then)))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, Since-1)
pobj(Since-1, then-2)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP am)
      (VP (VBN been)
        (VP (VBG searching)
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP
              (NP (JJ vain))
              (PP (IN for)
                (NP (DT a) (NNP Lo) (NNP Mai) (NNP Kai)))))
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP
              (NP (NNP Singapore))
              (SBAR
                (WHNP (WDT that))
                (S
                  (VP (MD could)
                    (VP (VB come)
                      (NP (NN close))
                      (SBAR (CC but)
                        (S
                          (NP (PRP I))
                          (VP (VBP think)
                            (SBAR
                              (S
                                (NP (DT the) (NN problem))
                                (VP (VBZ is)
                                  (SBAR (IN that)
                                    (S
                                      (NP (DT no) (NN one))
                                      (ADVP (RB actually))
                                      (VP (VBZ uses)
                                        (NP (NN pork) (NN lard))
                                        (ADVP (RB anymore))))))))))))))))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubjpass(searching-4, I-1)
auxpass(searching-4, am-2)
aux(searching-4, been-3)
root(ROOT-0, searching-4)
prep(searching-4, in-5)
pobj(in-5, vain-6)
prep(vain-6, for-7)
det(Kai-11, a-8)
nn(Kai-11, Lo-9)
nn(Kai-11, Mai-10)
pobj(for-7, Kai-11)
prep(searching-4, in-12)
pobj(in-12, Singapore-13)
nsubj(come-16, that-14)
aux(come-16, could-15)
rcmod(Singapore-13, come-16)
dobj(come-16, close-17)
cc(think-20, but-18)
nsubj(think-20, I-19)
dep(come-16, think-20)
det(problem-22, the-21)
nsubj(is-23, problem-22)
ccomp(think-20, is-23)
mark(uses-28, that-24)
det(one-26, no-25)
nsubj(uses-28, one-26)
advmod(uses-28, actually-27)
ccomp(is-23, uses-28)
nn(lard-30, pork-29)
dobj(uses-28, lard-30)
advmod(uses-28, anymore-31)


(ROOT
  (S (IN so)
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP have) (RB not)
      (VP (VBN found)
        (NP (NN anything) (NN half))
        (PP (IN as)
          (NP (NN shiok)))))
    (. .)))


dep(found-5, so-1)
nsubj(found-5, I-2)
aux(found-5, have-3)
neg(found-5, not-4)
root(ROOT-0, found-5)
nn(half-7, anything-6)
dobj(found-5, half-7)
prep(found-5, as-8)
pobj(as-8, shiok-9)
